Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.rating

Class DynamicRating

java.lang.Object
com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.rating.DynamicRating
public class DynamicRating extends Object
Helper class to handle rating events requested by the app.

It must be initialized once before accessing its methods.

      Sets the minimum no. of days to be passed after the last reminder.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The DynamicRating object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods.

    • shouldRateDialog

      public boolean shouldRateDialog(@Nullable RatingListener ratingListener, @Nullable FragmentActivity fragmentActivity)
      Show the DynamicRatingDialog if all the rating conditions are met.
      Parameters:
      ratingListener - The rating listener for the dialog.
      fragmentActivity - The fragment activity to show the dialog.
      Returns:
      true if all the rating conditions are met and the dialog is shown.
